sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; class Team extends React.Component { render() { return (
Pawel Osowski Chief Strategy Officer Pawel Osowski Chief Strategy Officer With a Master’s degree in law and an MBA from the University of Montreal, Pawel is one of Poland’s leading business and investment experts, member of numerous boards and panels including the European Commission, PR Boutiques International and arena.pl. He is also Managing Partner of ONEX Capital Limited & Warsaw Consultants.
James Mortimer Chief Marketing & Content Officer James Mortimer Chief Marketing & Content Officer Instrumental in building up the social media and content presence of the All Blacks over eight years, James also launched the digital assets of SANZAAR, who negotiated a $1 billion broadcasting deal in 2015.
